# PromptScript - Infrastructure-as-Code for AI Context
# https://getpromptscript.dev

> PromptScript is a language and toolchain for standardizing AI coding assistant
> instructions across enterprise organizations. It compiles .prs files to native
> formats for GitHub Copilot, Cursor, Claude Code, and other AI tools.

## Documentation

- Getting Started: https://getpromptscript.dev/latest/getting-started/
- Tutorial: https://getpromptscript.dev/latest/tutorial/
- Language Reference: https://getpromptscript.dev/latest/reference/language/
- CLI Reference: https://getpromptscript.dev/latest/reference/cli/
- Configuration: https://getpromptscript.dev/latest/reference/config/

## Guides

- Official Registry: https://getpromptscript.dev/latest/guides/registry/
- CI/CD Integration: https://getpromptscript.dev/latest/guides/ci/
- Inheritance: https://getpromptscript.dev/latest/guides/inheritance/
- Multi-File Organization: https://getpromptscript.dev/latest/guides/multi-file/
- Enterprise Setup: https://getpromptscript.dev/latest/guides/enterprise/
- Migration: https://getpromptscript.dev/latest/guides/migration/

## Examples

- Minimal Setup: https://getpromptscript.dev/latest/examples/minimal/
- Team Setup: https://getpromptscript.dev/latest/examples/team-setup/
- Enterprise: https://getpromptscript.dev/latest/examples/enterprise/

## Resources

- Playground: https://getpromptscript.dev/playground/
- GitHub: https://github.com/mrwogu/promptscript
- npm: https://www.npmjs.com/org/promptscript

## Quick Install

```bash
npm install -g @promptscript/cli
prs init
prs compile
```

## Contact

- Issues: https://github.com/mrwogu/promptscript/issues
- Discussions: https://github.com/mrwogu/promptscript/discussions
